column5: Hey guys I've been fishing muskie for around 3 years now and I'm hooked. I was wondering if there were any experienced muskie anglers on this forum to plan a day trip. I usually fish the kawarthas, or if you have a better spot in mind we could go there. I have my own quality gear and a 16.2 princecraft pro series boat or We could use your boat if you prefer. Pm me for details and to plan something!
Mike PM sent have a couple of weeks off and my normal partner got married (Normal in that we fish together) so we could line something up.
Your in great hands with John have a great day
If you have a day in mind,  im always up for some muskie fishing in the kawarthas. I usually have a day off during the week.  I also have my own boat,  or could tag along.
Yes I have heard and read some great things, hoping to get something planned!
Nope this is like the show the replacements Mike is playing Keanu Reeves on Sunday hope he is good with the net and a Hose Bait
Nope this is like the show the replacements Mike is playing Keanu Reeves on Sunday hope he is good with the net and a Hose Bait Keanu Reeves is a tough act to follow, and was awesome in The Matrix.
